examples: We will arrive at the airport in an hour.
She arrived late for the meeting.
The package should arrive by Friday.
Nós chegaremos ao aeroporto em uma hora.
Ela chegou atrasada para a reunião.
A encomenda deve chegar até sexta-feira.

suggested: Why did the math book always arrive late to class? It could never find the right angle to get there on time!
It's always sad when you eagerly wait for someone to arrive, but they never show up.
I get so angry when flights get delayed and I have to wait hours for the plane to arrive.
Did you know that the word 'arrive' comes from the Latin word 'advenire', which means 'to come to'?
The smell of freshly baked goods as they arrive out of the oven.
The feeling of relief and excitement when a long-awaited package finally arrives at your doorstep.
Arriving at a destination can create a sense of connection to a new place and its people.
